name: tablesplit
description: A revolutionary group expense tracking app with a poker-themed social experience

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && npm start"
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm test && cd ../backend && npm test
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: TableSplit Team
